data.title: Michigan Cities by Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Get a list of Michigan cities by population based on Census 2023 data.
data.text:
The most populated cities in Michigan are Detroit with 633,218, Grand Rapids at 196,608, Warren city with 136,655, Sterling Heights at 133,306, and Ann Arbor with 119,381. You can get the most current Census population data for all 1,520 Michigan cities, sorted from the most populous cities in Michigan to the least, according to the 2023 Population Estimates Program and 2022 American Community Survey.

Sure, you can copy this list right into your favorite spreadsheet tool. Or save yourself formatting headaches and grab the latest Michigan cities population data as a ready-to-use Excelâ„¢ file below. It's time to stop searching and start digging into data!
